feed.title: Functional & Evolutionary Genomics
feed.subtitle: Functional and evolutionary genomics group at Nord University. We study molecular mechanisms of adaptive traits.

entry.title: Congrats to Peter for his BSc!

link.title: Congrats to Peter for his BSc!

entry.content: Peter received his BSc in Biology certificate today after doing a fantastic job with his thesis. We are all happy for you, congratulations!
entry.summary: Peter received his BSc in Biology certificate today after doing a fantastic job with his thesis. We are all happy for you, congratulations!

entry.title: New PhD position
entry.content: We have received funding for a 3-year PhD project. More info and add coming up soon - in the meanwhile contact J-P for more details.
entry.summary: We have received funding for a 3-year PhD project. More info and add coming up soon - in the meanwhile contact J-P for more details.

entry.title: Commentary of PNAS paper
entry.content:
Mafalda Ferreira from Stockholm University wrote a great commentary on our recent paper in PNAS.

Ferreira M: Evolution of complexity through regulatory variation at a single gene, PNAS 122:e2424050122 (2025)
entry.summary: Mafalda Ferreira from Stockholm University wrote a great commentary on our recent paper in PNAS.

entry.title: Salmon in the news
entry.content:
Atlantic salmon has huge diversity in life histories - but how is such diversity encoded in their genes? See the linked press release for more on our recent paper in PNAS.

https://www.helsinki.fi/en/news/evolution/salmon-genes-unlock-secrets-puberty-and-evolution
entry.summary: Atlantic salmon has huge diversity in life histories - but how is such diversity encoded in their genes? See the linked press release for more on our recent paper in PNAS.
